Sun.functionInDescent: The false center of radiant pride

Moon.vice: Increase and decrease, attachment to change, flux, illusion, growth and loss
Moon.functionInDescent: The soul's entry into time cycles

Mars.vice: Rashness, anger, violence, impulse and will

Mercury.vice: Deceit, cunning, intellectual pride, and trickery
Mercury.functionInDescent: Misuse of mind or false cleverness

Jupiter.vice: Evil purpose, ambition, manipulation, and hunger to rule

Saturn.vice: Falsehood, spiritual blindness, and ultimate illusion
Saturn.functionInDescent: The final veil, root of forgetfulness
